| Overview                = '''Oscorp''' ('''[[NYSE]]:''' OZ) is an [[United States of America|American]] multinational corporation. It is headquartered in [[Oscorp Tower]] in [[Manhattan]], [[New York City]]. Formerly known as Osborn Industries, Oscorp's President and CEO was billionaire industrialist [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman Osborn]].

| History                 = 
==Origin==
It was created and ran by its CEO, Norman Osborn. Norman studied chemistry and electrical engineering in college. He also took a number of courses in business administration. Norman Osborn's teacher Professor [[Mendel Stromm (Earth-616)|Mendel Stromm]] formed the business partnership. Since Norman put up the bulk of the financing, they called their company Osborn Chemical, or Oscorp.

Oscorp later came under the control of [[Elizabeth Allan (Earth-616)|Liz Allan]]'s [[Alchemax (Earth-616)|Alchemax]].{{r|Superior Spider-Man #19}}
| Equipment               = [[Goblin Armor]]
